name: 楊侑倫
objective:
＊提醒：本課程為全英語授課，對學生英語程度要求高，需要經常以英語回答問題，口頭報告並與外籍生互動，期末考也需以全英語作答。 無法達成上述要求可導致無法順利通過本科目。

＊本課程在一般授課時間外，每位同學也需經常到實驗室做實驗，並在課堂上討論實驗結果做為平時成績。


＊Reminder: This is an international students friendly course. Domestic students are required to use full English to answer questions, do the presentation and write exam sheets.

＊In addition to regular class hours, this course requires frequent laboratory experiments. The experimental results will be discussed in class and will count towards the continuous assessment.
schedule:
week 1: Introduction of the course
week 2: Introduction of Creep age forming
week 3: lab work and basic of constitutive equations for Creep age forming
week 4: lab work and basic of constitutive equations for Creep age forming2
week 5: matlab coding of constitutive equations
week 6: matlab coding of constitutive equations 2
week 7: Subroutine code
week 8: Implementation of subroutine code to FE 

week 9: Midterm exam

week 10: Introduction of hot stamping
week 11: PDE constitutive equations for hot stamping
week 12: PDE constitutive equations for hot stamping
week 13: matlab coding of constitutive equations
week 14: matlab coding of constitutive equations 2
week 15: Subroutine code
week 16: Implementation of subroutine code to FE 
week 17: Summary of course/ Repetition
week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
attendance 10%
(You will be failed if you absent 3 times in this semester)

labwork 40%
midterm exam 25%
final exam 25%
materials: LIN, Jianguo. Fundamentals of materials modelling for metals processing technologies: theories and applications. World Scientific Publishing Company, 2015.
